title: ToonMarty
overview: In the middle of ToonVille, where all cartoons live, sits the ToonMart, where all cartoons hang out. As an employee there, Marty believes his job is to stick his nose into everyone's businessâ€¦ And there's no business Marty likes better than somebody else's business, except maybe show business... With every bend, bounce, flip and spin, Marty makes a great big cartoony adventure out of everything and then makes an even bigger one cleaning up. He always makes sure everyone feels included in his Marty party! ToonMarty turns every cartoon trope on its ear - having a grand time with things like idea light bulbs, smoke trails or chase scenes. Inspired by classic cartoons, ToonMarty is very much in the spirit of today: a freewheeling and irreverent good time!
